layout.singingstanza: Work -- ing will not save me; Pur -- est deeds that I can do, Hol -- iest thoughts and feel -- ings too, Can -- not form my soul a -- new; Work -- ing will not save me. Je -- sus wept and died for me; Je -- sus suf -- fered on the tree; Je -- sus waits to make me free, He a -- lone can save me.

lyrics.stanza: Praying will not save me; All the prayers that I could say Could not wash my sins away, All I owe could never pay: Praying will not save me.
